mapper.select: SELECT interface_config_id, request_name, request_type, currentMode, param.param_interface_id AS param_interface_id, param.param_key_id AS param_key_id, param.param_index AS param_index, param.param_length AS param_length, param.param_field AS param_field, param.param_value AS param_value, param.param_type AS param_type, param.param_io AS param_io FROM t_interface_config LEFT JOIN param ON param_interface_id=#{paramInterfaceId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where interface_config_id = param_interface_id
